施.definition: (bound form) to put into effect (regulations etc); to distribute (alms etc); to apply (fertilizer etc)

施主.definition: benefactor (term used by a monk to address a layperson); donor (semiconductor)

施予.definition: variant of 施與|施与[shi1 yu3]

施以.definition: to inflict (punishment); to provide (training etc); to apply (pressure etc)

施展.definition: to use fully; to put to use

施工.definition: construction; to carry out construction or large-scale repairs

施工單位.definition: unit in charge of construction; builder

施恩.definition: to confer a favor on sb; to confer a benefit

施惠.definition: to give charity to sb; to oblige

施捨.definition: to give in charity; to give alms (to the poor)

施放.definition: to fire; to discharge; to release (fireworks, smokescreen, poison gas, virus etc)

施明德.definition: Shih Ming-teh (1941-2024), Taiwanese politician, imprisoned 1962-1977 and 1980-1990 under the Guomindang, subsequently a leader of DPP 民進黨|民进党[Min2jin4dang3], in 2006 led protests against Chen Shui-Bian 陳水扁|陈水扁[Chen2 Shui3bian3]

施暴.definition: to use violence; to attack; to assault

施治.definition: to apply a treatment; to undertake a therapy

施法.definition: to implement the law; to perform sorcery

施特勞斯.definition: Strauss (name); Johann Strauss (1825-1899), Austrian composer; Richard Strauss (1864-1949), German composer

施琅.definition: Shi Lang (1621-1696), Chinese admiral who served under the Ming and Qing dynasties

施瓦辛格.definition: Arnold Schwarzenegger (1947-), US actor and politician, governor of California 2003-2011

施甸.definition: Shidian county in Baoshan 保山[Bao3 shan1], Yunnan

施甸縣.definition: Shidian county in Baoshan 保山[Bao3 shan1], Yunnan

施秉.definition: Shibing county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

施秉縣.definition: Shibing county in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南州|黔东南州[Qian2 dong1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

施羅德.definition: Schröder (name); Gerhard Schröder (1944-), German SPD politician, Chancellor 1998-2005

施耐庵.definition: Shi Nai'an (1296-1371), author of Water Margin or Outlaws of the Marsh 水滸傳|水浒传[Shui3 hu3 Zhuan4]

施肥.definition: to spread manure; to apply fertilizer

施與.definition: to donate; to give; to grant; to distribute; to administer

施華洛世奇水晶.pinyin: Shi1 hua2 luo4 shi4 qi2 shui3 jing1

施虐.definition: to torment; to abuse (an animal, child etc)

施行.definition: to put in place; to put into practice; to take effect

施食.definition: to give food (as a charity); "feeding the hungry ghosts" (Buddhist ceremony)
